tutorialStepInfo.headerContentMd: Tell everyone who you are. Show you name on the LEDs.
tutorialStepInfo.contentMd:
Tell everyone who you are. Show you name on the LEDs.

![Name scrolling on the LEDs](/static/mb/projects/name-tag/name-tag.gif)

tutorialStepInfo.headerContentMd: Place the ``||basic:show string||`` block in the ``||basic:forever||`` block to repeat it. Change the text to your name.
Look at the simulator and make sure it shows up your name on the screen.
tutorialStepInfo.contentMd:
Look at the simulator and make sure it shows up your name on the screen.

![Name scrolling on the LEDs](/static/mb/projects/name-tag/name-tag.gif)

tutorialStepInfo.headerContentMd: Place more ``||basic:show string||`` blocks to create your own story.
If you have a @boardname@ connected, click ``|Download|`` to transfer your code and watch your name scroll!
tutorialStepInfo.contentMd: If you have a @boardname@ connected, click ``|Download|`` to transfer your code and watch your name scroll!
